name: TheElementalist
description:
The Elementalist is a 2D platformer game with a magical twist. Your character is a wizard who possesses the power of controlling elements. He can use this power to change the environment in order to get to the location of a magical crystal. The crystal is protected by enemies who are immune against his magic.  Thus, he must approach fighting them smartly. 

The game was developed as an entry for Ludum Dare 49 (72 hours JAM event). 
Theme: Unstable

CONTROLS:

  • Movement: A and D
  • Jumping: W or SPACE
  • Pause: P
  • Retry: R
  • Shooting: Left mouse button
  • Spells: Q (ice-ball) and E (fireball)

TEAM MEMBERS:

Jiří Filek – programming, technical art, level design
Martina Fusková – game design, level design, UI design, sound design
Eve – graphics, testing, level aesthetics

LICENSING:

Soundtrack composed by AIVA (Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist): https://www.aiva.ai

Sound effects obtained from  https://www.zapsplat.com, https://freesound.org/ and https://mixkit.co/
